translation.ja: “あふれる魅力と活気 愛にも感謝してる”

translation.en: "Thank you for getting over this, for moving forward, for being you."
translation.ja: “クスリを断ち 君らしく生きてることにも”

translation.en: "Thank you for all the shit I forget to thank you for…
translation.ja: “他にもいろいろある”

translation.en: and thank you for looking so goddamn sexy in that dress tonight."
translation.ja: “今夜のセクシーな 装いにも礼を言う”

translation.en: "You make me look good."
translation.ja: “君のおかげで―”

translation.en: "You make me a better person."
translation.ja: “いい人間になれる”

translation.en: "Thank you for understanding
translation.ja: “君は俺の理解者だ”

translation.en: that I'm not always great at expressing how I feel
translation.ja: “私生活の俺は 感情表現が下手だと―”

translation.en: and it comes out in my work more than in real life."
translation.ja: “分かってくれてる”

translation.en: "Thank you because…
translation.ja: “ありがとう”

translation.en: I know it doesn't always feel good, so I hope you can live with that."
translation.ja: “つらい時もあるだろ？ 大丈夫かい？”

translation.en: [voice breaking] "Thank you."
translation.ja: “ありがとう”

translation.en: "I know I'm emotionally obtuse sometimes, but I'm grateful you don't hold it against me."
translation.ja: “俺が無神経でも 根に持たずにいてくれる”

translation.en: "Thank you…
translation.ja: “ありがとう”

translation.en: for assuming the best."
translation.ja: “信頼がうれしい”

translation.en: "I love you, Marie. I'll always love you, my Marie."
translation.ja: “愛してるよ マリー これからもずっと”

translation.en: "Thank you."
translation.ja: “ありがとう”

translation.en: "From the bottom of my heart, thank you."
translation.ja: “心から感謝してる”

translation.en: I love you, Marie.
translation.ja: 愛してる マリー

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 悪かった

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: [Marie] You're welcome.
translation.ja: どういたしまして

translation.en: Marie?
translation.ja: マリー

translation.en: Marie?
translation.ja: マリー

translation.en: Marie!

translation.en: -[birds chirping] -Marie!
